v.1.0.4-alpha.description:
**WARNING: This is an ALPHA, problems might arise that lead to being unable to goal your game!**

Changelog
* Added an option for local fill for Itemsanity
* Added Trap Link
* Green Dyed Blocks and Green Dye now require smelting to be in logic (Itemsanity)
* Nether Sprouts now require Shears to be in logic (Itemsanity)
* Potions given to the player by the multiworld will no longer give bottles when drank
* Literature Traps now actually function
v.1.0.4-alpha.title: Minecraft Fabric AP (1.0.4 Alpha)

v1.0.0-alpha.description:
**WARNING: This is an ALPHA, problems might arise that lead to being unable to goal your game!**

First alpha release for the Minecraft Fabric AP World (**unstable**)

Current Features Include
* Goals for vanilla Minecraft Bosses (Advancement and Ruby Hunt Goals currently not implemented)
* Locations and Items for Vanilla Minecraft Progression
* A beatable game (hopefully 🤞)
* Swimming and Sprinting ability toggles
* Speedrunner mode toggle (requires bed for dragon goal)
* various traps with ability to determine weight
v1.0.0-alpha.title: Minecraft Fabric AP (1.0.0 Alpha)

v1.0.1-alpha.description:
**WARNING: This is an ALPHA, problems might arise that lead to being unable to goal your game!**

Changelog
* Added In-Game Tracker for Received Items and Goal
* Added Deathlink
* Added Ability to lock Jumping, Chest Usage, and Shield Recipes
* Added Ruby Hunt Goal
* Added Advancement Goal
* Added ability to gate completion of goals behind getting “X number” of Advancements
* Added a Tag To determine if a block being uncraftable should also stop use of the block
* Added a Tag to prevent Locked Block Breaking
* Added Keep Inventory Yaml setting (On by default) 
* Anvil Recipe is now locked behind Enchanting
* Status Effect Traps can now stack
* Random Status Effect Trap now applies Effects other than Poison
* Fixed Bug Where Worlds didn't save Archipelago Server Information when the game was restarted
* Fixed Pufferfish and Ender Pearls Items not giving anything when received
* Fixed Crossbow and Flint and Steel being craftable when locked
* Fixed Golden Carrot giving Apples
* "Very Very Frightening" is now considered a hard Advancement
* "The Cutest Predator" now requires a bucket to be in logic
* Made it so the AP Item Sounds can't multiple times at once (No More Really loud sounds when releasing)
v1.0.1-alpha.title: Minecraft Fabric AP (1.0.1 Alpha)

v1.0.2-alpha.description:
**WARNING: This is an ALPHA, problems might arise that lead to being unable to goal your game!**

Changelog
* Advancements that can be locations in the Archipelago will now always show themselves, and Advancements that can't be locations are now always hidden
* Advancements now sync properly whenever a new player joins the game
* Item and Goal Tracker Screen now pauses the game if you’re in single player
* Fixed Advancements Only Goal Not triggering when collecting enough Advancements
* Furnaces found naturally can now no longer be broken without “Progressive Smelting” (x1)
* "Light as a Rabbit" is now considered an Exploration Advancement
* Minecart Chests can no longer be broken or opened without the “Chests or Barrels” check
* Made it so that blocks in the “ap_lock_block_breaking” tag can’t be destroyed by explosions while locked
* Fixed “Crafting a New Look” being unobtainable based on progressive armor tier
* “Crafting a New Look” now requires “Chests and Barrels” and “Progressive Armor” (x1) to be considered in logic
* “This Boat Has Legs” and “Feels Like Home” now require “Chests or Barrels” to be in logic
* Fixed "Hidden in the Depths" not being a location
* Added Manifest json to ap world
v1.0.2-alpha.title: Minecraft Fabric AP (1.0.2 Alpha)

v1.0.3-alpha.description:
**WARNING: This is an ALPHA, problems might arise that lead to being unable to goal your game!**

Changelog
* Added a YAML setting for difficulty (determines where Jump, Iron Weapons, Iron Armor, Bows, and Sprint are placed in logic)
* Added Itemsanity option to YAML (This setting causes  items that are found to send checks. This setting is off by default)
* Added New Junk and Useful Items (Dye, Enchanted Books, Potions)
* Removed Random Fruit and replaced it with Apples
* Changed the Base Chance for Wither Skeletons to drop skulls from 0.025% to 0.25%
* Added a YAML setting for excluding “Unreasonable” Advancements ("How Did We Get Here?" and "Adventuring Time")
* “Cover Me in Debris” and “Serious Dedication” are now considered Hard Advancements
* "Sniper Duel" is now no longer considered a Hard Advancement
* Fixed Sprinting, Jumping, and Part of Swimming always being locked when running the mod outside of single player
* Fixed Jump and Sprint not being in logic when set to do so in YAML
* Fixed Tracker sometimes having a really long decimals for the percentage value
* Updated License and README to have the correct link
* Fixed Deathlink breaking player's Armor
* Fixed Occasional Crash that can occur as a result of the server player list changing while looping over it to sync advancements
v1.0.3-alpha.title: Minecraft Fabric AP (1.0.3 Alpha)

v1.0.4.1-alpha.description:
**WARNING: This is an ALPHA, problems might arise that lead to being unable to goal your game!**

Changelog
* Fixes Lime Dye and Lime Dye blocks not requiring smelting in logic
v1.0.4.1-alpha.title: Minecraft Fabric AP (1.0.4 Alpha) HOTFIX

v1.0.5-alpha.description:
* Added “Progressive Dye Recipes” and “Bundle Recipes” as Items
* Added Prismarine Shards and Prismarine Crystals as Junk Items
* Changed Advancement Location Exclusion Options so they now apply to all Location Types
* All Items that were originally excluded (Except Potions and Enchanted Books) are now included in Itemsanity, but can be excluded based on Location Exclusion Options
* Drowned will now always drop their hand stacks
* “Is It a Bird” is now considered an Exploration Advancement
* “Uneasy Alliance” is now a hard Advancement
* “Smithing with Style” is now an Unreasonable Advancement
* Fixed Trap Link sending Traps to yourself when a trap is received
* Fixed Logic for Zombie Doctor
* Cleaned Up AP World Code in Prep for Mod support (just getting ready, not adding mod support until issues with vanilla are gone)
* Fixed Logic Errors for the Following Itemsanity Locations:
	* Lanterns
	* Chains
	* Hanging Signs
	* Podzol
	* Blast Furnace
	* Smoker
	* Iron Weapons
	* Golden Weapons
	* Stone Weapons
	* Diamond Weapons
v1.0.5-alpha.title: Minecraft Fabric AP (1.0.5 Alpha)

v1.0.5.1-alpha.description:
**WARNING: This is an ALPHA, problems might arise that lead to being unable to goal your game!**

Changelog
* Fixes Rubies having ID 0, making them unobtainable
v1.0.5.1-alpha.title: Minecraft Fabric AP (1.0.5 Alpha) HOTFIX

v1.0.6-alpha.description:
**WARNING: This is an ALPHA, problems might arise that lead to being unable to goal your game!**

Changelog
* Added Icons that show up on items that haven’t been collected if Itemsanity is enabled (+ Compat for Jade, JEI, & REI)
* Items and Traps Received on a Multiplayer Server will now be given to all players, even if there’s no one in the server
* Deathlinks will now send to other players on a Multiplayer Server if they come from a Player on the Server
* Beehives that generate naturally will now be filled with honey
* Added Option to increase the chance for Copper Blocks to enter their Pre-Oxidation State (an attempt to Oxidize before accounting for nearby Copper Blocks) from 5% to 55%
* Wither Skeleton Skull Drop rates are now handled by a second loot table in order to prevent overriding of modded loot (This does mean there is an extremely rare chance for a Wither Skeleton to drop 2 skulls, but I don’t think that’s a huge issue)
* Bumped Drop chance of Rabbits Foot drop chance from 10% to 50%
* Higher Loot Drop Rates can now be toggled on/off via the YAML settings
* Toggle Options for Jump, Sprint, Chests, and Swim merged into an OptionSet setting
* Toggle Options for Excluding Hard, Exploration, and Unreasonable Locations merged into an OptionSet setting
* Added More customizable Difficulty Settings
* Added Chat Tip when the Game is Started to let player know about the existence of the in-game Tracker (can be disabled via configs)
* Added a YAML option to replace a percentage of filler with items that do nothing (mainly to help prevent inventory clutter with Itemsanity)
* Discs, Trims, Sherds, Heads, Extremely Rare Ores, and Netherite Gear now rely on an itemsanity exclusion setting rather than default exclusion settings
* Fixed Logic Errors for Hanging Roots, Deepslate, Cracked Deepslate Bricks, and Cracked Deepslate Tiles
* “Arbalistic” and “Two Birds One Arrow” now require enchanting to be in logic
* “Arbalistic” is now considered a Hard Advancement
* “Star Trader” now requires buckets to be considered in logic
* “Hero of the Village”, “Postmortal”, and Totem of Undying now have difficulty settings that determine if raids are in logic
* Mud Items now require Glass Bottles to be considered in logic
* The Following Items are now blacklistable with the Exploration Items option:
	* Red Sand Items
	* Coral Items
	* Pink Petals
	* Blue Orchid
	* Cactus (+ Green Dye and things that require it)
	* Sunflowers
	* Lily Pads
	* Sweet Berries
	* Cocoa Beans (+ Brown Dye and things that require it)
	* Bamboo Items
	* Dark Oak Items
	* Mangrove Items
	* Cherry Items
	* Melons
	* Cobwebs
* Tall Grass and Large Ferns are now Marked as Unreasonable Items
* Fixed Enchanted Books given by the Randomizer being “Enchanted Books Enchanted with the Enchantment” rather than “Enchanted Books that contain the Enchantment”
* Fixed a bug that would make it so Item Receive sounds didn't always play
* Fixed Netherite Ingot Recipe being locked behind resource compacting when it shouldn’t have been
* Re-Added Pink and Magenta Itemsanity checks that were accidentally removed previous version
* Fixed Reverse Controls Traps not being received when using Traplink
* Overkill no longer is triggered by Ghast Fireballs
* On A Rail now no longer has a chance to trigger immediately upon entering a minecart
* Added Custom Splash Texts and Literature Trap Texts suggested by users in google form
v1.0.6-alpha.title: Minecraft Fabric AP (1.0.6 Alpha)
